data.title: List of books by author James Allen
data.meta_description: Get your James Allen books today! Pango Books has a huge selection of new and used titles to choose from. See all books including: The Wisdom of James Allen, How to Prosper in Hard Times, As a Man Thinketh: the Original 1902 Edition (the Wisdom of James Allen), Como Piensa el Ser Humano, Asi Es Su Vida, Essential Prosperity, As a Man Thinketh, From Poverty to Power, The Founder's Mentality, Repeatability, As You Think, Profit from the Core, Mind Is the Master
